net.sf.mmm.client.ui.base.widget

Class AbstractUiWidgetFactoryNative

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.mmm.util.component.base.AbstractComponent
      • net.sf.mmm.client.ui.base.widget.AbstractUiWidgetFactoryNative
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AbstractUiWidgetFactoryNative, UiWidgetFactoryNative
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    UiWidgetFactoryNativeGwt, UiWidgetFactoryNativeTestImpl

    public abstract class AbstractUiWidgetFactoryNative
extends AbstractComponent
implements UiWidgetFactoryNative
    This is the abstract base implementation of UiContext using UiSingleWidgetFactoryNative. This is helpful for implementations that can NOT use reflection. Implementations extending this Class need to register instances of UiSingleWidgetFactoryNative for all supported types of UiWidgets.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

      • create

        public <WIDGET extends UiWidgetNative> WIDGET create(Class<WIDGET> widgetInterface)
        This method creates a new UiWidget instance of the given type ( widgetInterface).
        IMPORTANT:
        When creating a large (enterprise) application client you should NOT (directly) use this method to create field widgets such as UiWidgetLocalDateField or UiWidgetTextField. Instead use UiWidgetFactoryDatatype.createForDatatype(Class).
        ATTENTION:
        The API of UiWidget defines base interfaces marks as abstract. These interfaces cannot be used as argument to this method. Further some widget interfaces are NOT abstract but will not be created via this method but from some other widget. To avoid confusion the widgets that can be created here are marked via the interface UiWidgetNative. All these interfaces except for UiWidgetNative itself can be created and should be supported as legal arguments to this method.
        Specified by:
        create in interface AbstractUiWidgetFactoryNative
        Type Parameters:
        WIDGET - is the generic type of the UiWidget to create.
        Parameters:
        widgetInterface - is the interface reflecting the UiWidget to create. Must NOT be abstract.
        Returns:
        the new UiWidget.

      • getNativeWidget

        public Object getNativeWidget(UiWidgetRegular widget)
        This method gets the underlying native widget of the given regular widget.
        Specified by:
        getNativeWidget in interface AbstractUiWidgetFactoryNative
        Parameters:
        widget - is the regular widget to unwrap. It has to be an instance created by this factory.
        Returns:
        the native widget.

      • getMainWindow

        public UiWidgetMainWindow getMainWindow()
        This method gets the application main window. In case of a web application this will be the browser window (respective the current tab). In case of a MDI (multiple document interface) client this is the master window. Otherwise it will be a new window that should be opened initially.
        Specified by:
        getMainWindow in interface AbstractUiWidgetFactoryNative
        Returns:
        the main window.

      • createMainWindow

        protected abstract UiWidgetMainWindow createMainWindow()
        Returns:
        a new instance of UiWidgetMainWindow for getMainWindow().
